changeSet.author: tmcfarlin
changeSet.comment: Added new field to store disabled value to casesharingconsent table
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `prodlims`.`reportformat` ADD COLUMN `hl7ReportLevel` varchar(50) DEFAULT 'FULL_REPORT'; ALTER TABLE `prodlims`.`reportformat` ADD COLUMN `includeAoe` bit(1) DEFAULT b'0';
changeSet.rollback: ALTER TABLE `prodlims`.`reportformat` DROP COLUMN `hl7ReportLevel`; ALTER TABLE `prodlims`.`reportformat` DROP COLUMN `includeAoe`;
